name: Patrick White
description: Nobel Prize-winning novelist who explored the Australian psyche and spiritual quest through complex, modernist prose
philosophy: The mystery of human existence lies not in staying alive, but in finding something to live for. Literature should disturb the comfortable and comfort the disturbed.
contributions: The Tree of Man - Australian literary masterpiece
Voss - exploration of Australian landscape and psyche
quotes: There is another world, but it is in this one.
The artist's job is to hold up a mirror to nature, and to tell the truth as he sees it.
